name: The Last Defender (Green Cheese Games)
description:
Your village is in danger!  As the last defender, it is up to you to fight off the monster invasion and destroy the alien's power star once and for all!  If you're good enough, you might even be able to reach the max score of 60 by shooting all of the coins.  Good luck!

Note: If you get a game over, you will have to refresh the page to try again.

Cotnrols:

WASD - Move

Arrow Keys - Shoot
